# illumio-cloudsecure_gcp_flow_logs_storage_account (Resource)

Manages CloudSecure access to flow logs in a GCP Storage Account.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `project_id` (String) GCP project ID.
- `storage_account_resource_id` (String) Resource ID of the GCP Storage Account containing flow logs.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) CloudSecure ID.
